pages.text: $(thing)压力室/$是一个多方块结构，用于将各种材料相互压缩。介于其很大的空气容量，其亦可作为“空气容器”使用。$(p)多方块结构的构建遵循下列规则：$(p)$(li)整个多方块结构的尺寸为 3*3*3，4*4*4，5*5*5，结构为中空。

$(li)结构的$(thing)边/$和$(thing)角/$必须是$(item)压力室墙壁/$或$(item)压力室玻璃/$。$(li)结构的$(thing)面/$必须是$(item)压力室墙壁/$，$(item)压力室玻璃/$，$(item)压力室气阀/$或$(l:manufacturing/pressure_chamber#interface)压力室接口/$。$(li)结构必须有至少一个$(item)压力室气阀/$。$(li)多方块结构建议有至少两个$(item)压力室接口/$（一个朝内，一个朝外）。

pages.text: 一个可行的压力室，尺寸为 5*5*5，有 4 个$(item)气阀/$和 4 个$(item)接口/$
$(item)压力室接口/$用于自动化$(thing)压力室/$的物品输入输出。物品$(italic)必须/$使用$(item)漏斗/$或其它模组添加的管道系统输入。建议有至少两个接口：一个写有“I”的一面朝外（即$(thing)输入接口/$），另一个写有“O”的一面朝外（即$(thing)输出接口/$）。

有好几种办法选定哪些物品应该被$(item)接口/$所输入输出。可以You can switch between them by clicking on the button in the $(thing)Filter/$ tab:$(li)$(bold)Item/$ - matches by item type; leaving the filter empty will allow import/export of any item.$(li)$(bold)Name Contains/$ - matches when the item name contains the given string$(li)$(bold)Name Starts With/$ - matches when the item starts with the given string

Output mode $(item)Interfaces/$ will auto-eject into an adjacent inventory; this may or may not include other mods' pipes, depending on whether or not they look like an inventory to the interface.$(p)It costs 1000mL of $(l:base_concepts/pressure)air/$ per item transferred. This means, to transfer a full stack, the $(item)Interface/$ needs 64000mL (4 bar for a basic 3x3x3 chamber). If the Interface seems to get 'stuck', it's just waiting for more pressure to build up.

$(bold)Tips/$$(p)$(li)When compressing $(item)Iron/$, compress $(item)Block of Iron/$, since it will use only 1/9th of the air.$(li)When adding a new item to an (empty) output Interface filter, set the Interface to run on a $(#f00)redstone signal/$. This will prevent it immediately pulling out items before the chamber even has a chance to compress them.$(li)$(l:components/transistor)Transistors/$ and $(l:components/capacitor)Capacitors/$ can be filtered by $(bold)Name Contains/$ 'tor'.
